page.title: 02A LOCAL FARM_BURNIERE
page.content: Burniere is a manor mentioned in the first{Domesday Book.}Then it was about 120 hectares, supported 27 men and their families, 4 cattle, 6 pigs and 150 sheep.On Burniere now there are 27 fields which cover 156 hectares.{Wheat covers 23 hectares.{Barley}covers 41 hectares.{Peas}cover 6 hectares and the rest is{grass.} Mr.Menhinick,whose family have been at Burniere for 200 years,has {369 {sheep}and{218 cattle}which are{ {Friesians}crossed with{Simmental.}He has asheep dog to help with the work and a few poultry for his own use. There are 3 men working on the farm now.They have a lot more machines than men.The biggest machines are{4 {tractors}and{1 combine harvester},some other machines are cultivators, trailers, cutters and loaders. There is a sheep dip to prevent sheep scab.
